title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-1.197 - Suspension of permits
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-1.197 - Suspension of permits

State Regulations

Permits may be suspended temporarily by the permit-issuing official, after notice and an opportunity to be heard, for failure of the permit holder to comply with the requirements of this Subpart, or with any lawful notice or order issued by the permit-issuing official or his designated representative. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
14-1.197

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
